title: GxSTxV
author: GxSTxV
content: I want to warn everyone who uses Telegram for bounties, signature campaigns, or has joined a group with known and trusted bitcointalk users. There is a new method scammers are using to deceive people by pretending to be someone else, and it can be very dangerous and tricky. This is a new trick for most people who use Telegram and have users from bitcointalk in their contacts they can easily fall for it. Me for example if someone on my contacts asked me for a favor i will do it if i could since the people on my contact are well trusted I will explain what we understood about this trap how it can be set to look like someone from your contacts is having a conversation with you.This incident occurred on the @Royse777 Telegram group "Bounty Hunters," ( where most of the participants in Royse's campaigns follow the group for updates about weekly and bounty payments) . A scammer used the @emoneyabc profile in Telegram to create groups with users on the same group and looking for victims, i was added to a group of 3 people Me, @emoneyabc and another person. The messages were sent from a user called exactly as emoneyabc and has the same picture when you click on it it takes you to the group informations and users so you will find the official @emoneyabc profile. No doubt it’s the legit and original account.Now you will be sure that you are dealing with the user you know from your contacts, now things get more exciting when that person you trust is asking you for a favor to pay one of his customers because someone or an emergency ( anyway the story will be different every time) The most dangerous and concerning aspect in this case is that @emoneyabc never created that group, we were both added by the scammer who is using either a different version of Telegram or a bot to bypass the app's privacy settings. As we had both set our settings so that nobody could add us to a group, yet we were still added. Everything appeared normal but it was not. And hopefully nobody fell into this trap YETNow i hope that @Royse777 and every community manager, signature and bounty manager that has a telegram group and contacts to warn his users and to be careful. And @emoneyabc is still looking for more information and maybe he give us more details here

ALWAYS CONFIRM IN DM, PM IF PERSON YOU TALK TO IS NOT AN IMPOSTER!!!

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.created_time: April 23, 2023, 05:38:06 AMLast edit: April 23, 2023, 05:50:33 AM by Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: wwzsocki on April 23, 2023, 01:02:59 AMsomehow imposter creates TG account that doesn't exists, when I click on that profile, username, comment in chat I am taken to group description page that is set up to look like my personal profileThis is a telegram feature. Owners/admins in group chats can choose to "remain anonymous" - go to your group settings > administrators > choose an admin > remain anonymous.When this option is turned on, you won't be able to see them in member list unless you're also an admin. When they chat, they will retain the group's picture and name - that's why at the start we see the perp match the group's picture and name to @emoneyabc's account.Quote from: wwzsocki on April 23, 2023, 01:02:59 AMadditionally imposter add people to group despite privacy settings that don't allow thatThis is the strange part   but it seems like a new feature, last I check months ago, there was no "nobody" and only "my contacts" and "everyone".

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: I was also targeted by the same guy with basically the same script."Can you send user xyz 220$ in usdt? I will settle it in 3 hours."After I said I can't he tried another approach telling me he would send around 250$ via Paypal and I should send 220$ in crypto and keep the rest, which I also declined. After some more words the whole chat was deleted by him.Didn't think much of it because I was busy with something and I was actually convinced it's the real person because we spoke about that crazy scammer before. He delivered bad translation work and requested more money.Lucky I didn't fall for it. From now on I will always confirm if the person is the real deal.
